page.title: 01Henley-on-Thames
page.content: The area of land within our 12km.block covers the town of Henley-on-Thames and its surrounding countryside,but not the river Thames.Henley-on-Thames is situated in the south western part of Oxfordshire. The town grew up around a crossing of the River Thames and has become world famous for its Summertime Regatta.Each July thousands of visitors fill the town.Some compete in the boating races and others spectate. The town is a thriving community.It has several schools for primary children, one comprehensive school and one sixth form college.A college of Further Education is sited in the town. Henley-on-Thames is a shopping and recreation area for the local community.There are several small villages nearby.
